resp = client.ccr.pause_follow(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.close(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.ccr.unfollow(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
)
print(resp2)

resp3 = client.indices.open(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
)
print(resp3)
